Module: Resolver:decorator

Resolver:decorator

Wraps the previously resolved instance or the component with a decorator by calling a decorator factory function. A decorator resolver requires a second argument to the Container#use or RegistrationBuilder#use call with which it is being used. This argument specifies the decorator factory and is either:
  • A String key of the decorator factory to resolve
  • A Function that is the decorator factory
